mapper.select: select count(id) as num, sum(score) as totalScore from order_evaluation where product_id = #{productId} and deleted = 0 and state = 1

select t.sku_title, t.score, t.comment, t.comment_pic, t.anonymity, t.create_time, r.nick_name, r.avatar from order_evaluation t left join member r on t.member_id = r.id where t.deleted = false and t.product_id = #{param.productId}
order by t.id desc
and t.score in (4, 5) order by t.update_time desc
and t.score in (2, 3) order by t.update_time desc
and t.score = 1 order by t.update_time desc
and t.comment_pic is not null order by t.update_time desc
order by t.update_time desc

select count(id) from order_evaluation where deleted = false and product_id = #{productId}
and score in (4, 5)
and score in (2, 3)
and score = 1
and comment_pic is not null
